channel.failureDescription:
You have attempted to check the top levels of a channel that does not exist.
This is illegal in 74% of known planetary systems.
Be glad that we're letting you off with just a warning.
channel.title: {{username}} Levels

history.title: {{username}}'s Level History
history.failureDescription:
It's possible that the user does not exist.
They might also not have a history.
Or maybe you just don't have access to it.

accounts.description: You can move all of your levels to a new account.
accounts.title: Changed accounts?

bots.description: You can report bots and get them blocked from gaining experience.
bots.disclaimer: Warning: our Discord channels are English-only.
bots.link: Join our Discord server and tell us about it.
bots.title: Bots taking your places?

levels.description: Levels are a simple representation of your activity on the channel. The rules are the same for every channel.
levels.list:
• Sending a message sets your activity meter to 10.
  • Every minute, your activity meter is reduced by 1.
  • Every minute, you get 4 or 5 XP if your activity meter is at least at 1.
  • In case you're active on 2 channels, you get 2 XP per channel.
  • In case you're active on 3 channels, you get 1 XP per channel.
  • If you're active on more than 3 channels at the same time, you don't get any points.
levels.title: How does it work?

patreon.description:
Help funding the future of Mikuia!
Click here to learn more.
patreon.title: Become a patron!

user.failureDescription:
Can't check the levels of a person that does not exist!
You can try creating a person and then try again.
Please be careful.
user.title: {{username}}'s Levels
